dict.string: Can I reorder the categories in Category menu?
Yes. Just long press on the category an drag reorder categories.
Can I sync the expenses on other phones?
No. We will be implemeting this feature in future updates.
How to delete expense or income added?
You can delete an expense or income in History menu by simply swioing left and tapping on Delete button.
Why can't I delete the category 'Others'?
'Others' category is the default category. If we delete a category, all the expense / income corresponding to the category will be moved to 'Others' category.
Can I transfer my records via mail?
Yes. You can export the data from Settings screen and you can mail to any mail ID.
I want to group the expense history on weekly basis. Can I do that?
Yes. Go to Settings > General. Select type of Grouping
How to turn off notifications on this app.
Go to Settings > General and turn off Reminder option.
